name: GeekTek IT Services
tagline: Los Angeles IT Support & Managed Services Company
description:
At GeekTek, we understand that when it comes to IT, one size does not fit all. 
Our program addresses the standard IT needs of small and mid-sized businesses combined with the unique needs of your business.
Since 1998, our mission has been to support our clients’ success by offering IT alternatives that are comprehensive, reliable, personalized and valuable.  
We offer ultra-responsive technical services, insightful IT consulting and business-changing cloud solutions.
